metadata.title: Contacts - ExchangeGO
metadata.description: Get in touch with ExchangeGO support team. We're available 24/7 via Telegram and email.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're here to help you 24/7. Choose your preferred way to get in touch.

support.title: Support Channels
support.description: Our team is always ready to assist you with any questions or issues.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: We typically respond within 1-3 hours during peak times and even faster during off-peak hours.

telegram.title: Telegram Support
telegram.description: Get instant support through our Telegram bot. Available 24/7 with quick response times.

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send us a detailed message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
